description:
Number of libraries for building RESTful web applications is growing
up. Selecting best framework becomes hard decision for web
developers.

During the presentation I will go through best libraries I can
recommend for building RESTful web applications.

Selection of libraries will be subjective, based on my experience
with building microservices in Python. I will share code examples,
weaknesses and strengths for each library. I hope everyone will find
something that best suits his needs.
title: Python REST frameworks review
